[note: this is a massive spoiler, but it's been 2 years. if you haven't played it. play it.]

BTW, the ending to portal 2 is impossible is because Wheatley is not stranded in deep space. He landed back on the surface of the moon only about 4 minutes after the portal closed. given the best case scenario he probably off the surface for maybe 6 minutes! BUT NO anything to accelerate him with one blast of air to get him to a speed of 2400 meters PER SECOND to escape the moon's gravity would INSTANTLY rip arms off and probablyÃ¯Â»Â¿ rip the GLADOS body from the ceiling. I did the math. his final velocity couldn't have been more than 400 meters per second,
